mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_WX_CHAT_SESSION wxchatsession where wxchatsession.SESSION_ID = #{session_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_WX_CHAT_SESSION ( SESSION_ID, ACCOUNTID, OPENID, CREATETIME, CREATELONG, UPDATETIME, C_CONTENT, FLAG, companyId ) VALUES( #{session_id:VARCHAR}, #{accountid:VARCHAR}, #{openid:VARCHAR}, now(), #{createLong:NUMERIC}, now(), #{c_content:VARCHAR}, #{flag:NUMERIC}, #{companyId:VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_WX_CHAT_SESSION SET ACCOUNTID = #{accountid:VARCHAR}, OPENID = #{openid:VARCHAR}, CREATELONG = #{createLong:NUMERIC}, UPDATETIME = sysdate, C_CONTENT = #{c_content:VARCHAR}, ENDTIME = #{endtime:TIMESTAMP} WHERE SESSION_ID = #{session_id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM TB_WX_CHAT_SESSION WHERE SESSION_ID in
#{ids}
mapper.select:
SELECT wxuser.nickname username, wxchatsession.* FROM TB_WX_CHAT_SESSION wxchatsession join tb_wx_user wxuser on (wxchatsession.accountid = wxuser.accountid and wxchatsession.openid = wxuser.openid) WHERE 1=1
and wxchatsession.accountid in
#{oid}
and ( wxchatsession.SESSION_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%')
or to_char(wxchatsession.CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%')
or wxchatsession.C_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%')
)
order by wxchatsession.CREATETIME DESC

select wxsession.c_content, wxreplay.ctypename dpt, count(1) content_num from TB_WX_CHAT_SESSION wxsession left join tb_wx_auto_replay wxreplay on wxsession.c_content = wxreplay.ckey WHERE 1=1
and wxsession.accountid in
#{oid}
and ( wxsession.C_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or wxreplay.ctypename LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') )
group by wxsession.c_content, wxreplay.ctypename,wxsession.accountid order by content_num desc
